item.description: Science Test GLHF Formula Use SI Unit when using formulas I = Q/T I = Ampere [A] Q = Coulomb [C] t = seconds [s] V = IR V = Volt [V] I = Ampere [A] R = ohm [Î©] E = Pt E = joule [J] P = watt [W] t = seconds [s] Power stations sell electricity in E = kWh P = kW t = h
